outbreakAlertConfiguration.START_PAGE_DISCRIPTION: Get ready to enhance your threat detection and response capabilities with FortiSOAR's Outbreak Alert Monitoring and Investigation setup wizard. This guided setup will assist you in selecting and configuring threat detection integrations, as well as defining investigation schedules. The wizard also automates the installation of new Outbreak Alerts tailored to selected severity levels, with built-in email notifications for top-notch protection.
outbreakAlertConfiguration.PREREQUISITIES_1: Ensure you have proper authorization and the necessary credentials to interact with the API for each integration selected on the
outbreakAlertConfiguration.PREREQUISITIES_3: page. Without credentials, you will be unable to proceed beyond the
outbreakAlertConfiguration.PREREQUISITIES_6: A quick summary of the applied changes will be displayed on the
outbreakAlertConfiguration.PREREQUISITIES_8: page, so feel free to explore the options offered by this wizard.
outbreakAlertConfiguration.SECOND_PAGE_DISCRIPTION:
Select your SIEM, UEBA, or other threat hunting sources to power your hunt as part of the outbreak response. This choice triggers relevant workflows and configurations in the background to optimize the hunt.

You can select multiple threat hunt integrations.
outbreakAlertConfiguration.THIRD_PAGE_FAZ_PARAMS: Specify the administrative domain (ADOM) name of the Fortinet FortiAnalyzer server based on which to search for logs in Fortinet FortiAnalyzer
outbreakAlertConfiguration.THIRD_PAGE_FSM_PARAMS: Provide the maximum number of events and incident that the Fortinet FortiSIEM will return as a response
outbreakAlertConfiguration.THIRD_PAGE_QRADAR_PARAMS: Provide the maximum number of events and incident that the response will return
outbreakAlertConfiguration.THIRD_PAGE_SPLUNK_PARAMS: Provide the maximum number of events and incident that the response will return
outbreakAlertConfiguration.FOURTH_PAGE_SECTION_1_DISCRIPTION: Specify the number of days within which outbreak should be considered for investigation.
outbreakAlertConfiguration.FOURTH_PAGE_SECTION_2_DISCRIPTION: Select the frequency of the investigation to create a schedule under Automation > Schedules. This schedule then periodically runs the investigation on the outbreaks at the specified frequency.
outbreakAlertConfiguration.FIFTH_PAGE_SECTION_1_TITLE: Auto Install Outbreak Alert Solution Pack
outbreakAlertConfiguration.FIFTH_PAGE_SECTION_1_CHECKBOX: Automatically install outbreak response solution packs
outbreakAlertConfiguration.FIFTH_PAGE_SECTION_1_DISCRIPTION_1: Select the severity levels of the outbreaks response solutionpacks for installation.
outbreakAlertConfiguration.FIFTH_PAGE_SECTION_1_DISCRIPTION_2: Once a new or an updated outbreaks becomes available, the framework installs it automatically.
outbreakAlertConfiguration.FIFTH_PAGE_SECTION_2_DISCRIPTION: Specify email addresses authorized to receive outbreaks updates. You can specify multiple email addresses separated by a comma (,).
outbreakAlertConfiguration.FIFTH_PAGE_SECTION_2_EMAIL_TOOLTIP: Enter a comma separated list of email IDs to whom you want to send the updates of outbreak alerts
outbreakAlertConfiguration.FIFTH_PAGE_SECTION_2_EMAIL_VALIDATION: This field is required and only comma separated list of email IDs are allowed.
outbreakAlertConfiguration.SIXTH_PAGE_DISCRIPTION_1: Configurations associated with prerequisites are now complete.
outbreakAlertConfiguration.SIXTH_PAGE_DISCRIPTION_2_3: in the navigation menu to start using this solution.
outbreakAlertConfiguration.SIXTH_PAGE_SUMMARY_HEADING_3: Threat hunt investigation window set to
outbreakAlertConfiguration.SIXTH_PAGE_SUMMARY_HEADING_5: Automatically install outbreak alert solution packs for outbreak alerts category:
outbreakAlertConfiguration.SIXTH_PAGE_SUMMARY_HEADING_6: Following email addresses will receive Outbreak alert update notifications:
outbreakAlertConfiguration.SIXTH_PAGE_AUTO_INSTALL_HEADING_1: To install the last 30 days outbreak response solution pack now, click to
outbreakAlertConfiguration.DIRECTIVE_MESSAGE_1: Do you want to schedule the ingestion?
outbreakAlertConfiguration.DIRECTIVE_TIMEZONE_TOOLTIP: Select the timezone that you want to export the report in. It uses UTC by default.
